meanings.sent1: After missing the first time, he had to retackle the opponent to stop them.
meanings.sent2: The football player practiced retackling to improve his defensive skills.
meanings.sent3: The coach joked that the player needed to retackle the tackling dummy until it surrendered.
meanings.sent4: She approached the difficult problem with determination, ready to retackle it until she found a solution.
meanings.sent5: The idea of retackling the challenge filled him with renewed energy and focus.

meanings.sent1: His retackling of the opponent was successful in preventing a goal.
meanings.sent2: The coach emphasized the importance of proper retackling technique during practice.
meanings.sent3: The team's strategy involved a lot of retackling to maintain possession of the ball.
meanings.sent4: The retackling of the ball carrier was a key moment in turning the game around.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered as they witnessed a perfect retackling by the defender.
